de.myfoo.commonj.jboss
Interface FooServiceMBean

All Superinterfaces:
org.jboss.system.Service, org.jboss.system.ServiceMBean
All Known Subinterfaces:
TimerManagerServiceMBean, WorkManagerServiceMBean
All Known Implementing Classes:
FooService, TimerManagerService, WorkManagerService
public interface FooServiceMBean
extends org.jboss.system.ServiceMBean

Abstract service MBean - contains the thread pool and JNDI settings.

Author:
Andreas Keldenich
